fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Inspect (Day): Choose a player. Then, choose two more. If your first target visits either of your targets, roleblock them and attack them.
-Decipher (Night): Choose a player. If they're visited by any non-killing role, attack the visitor and learn your target's role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Decipher is unaffected by frames. Inspect will not roleblock if Everfrost is in the game.
